title: Rocky Mountain National Park: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        NPS   Â      Rocky Mountain National Park is a natural playground for kids and families. The park is dedicated to helping each generation become more connected to the outdoors. Teaching families how to explore the natural world on their own can inspire a lifetime of wonder and discovery in our wilderness areas.         Rocky: An Outdoor Playground FREE programs geared for kids happen all around the park. Junior Ranger Headquarters is a great place to start.        Become a Junior Ranger! Learn how you can earn your own ranger badge.          Explore WebRanger Visit national parks anytime you want and connect with other Junior Rangers around the world!        Nature Do you wonder what makes Rocky so special? Explore our nature section to find out.          Fun Facts Have squirrely questions about the park?  See if they can be answered through some of these fun facts.
